statements.query: MATCH (n:LaunchTemplateVersion)<-[:VERSION]-(:LaunchTemplate)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: {AWS_ID}}) WHERE n.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH n LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
MATCH (n:LaunchTemplate)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: {AWS_ID}}) WHERE n.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH n LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
